text: The 2000 African Women's Handball Championship was the 14th edition of the African Women's Handball Championship, held in Algeria from 23 April to 1 May 2000. It acted as the African qualifying tournament for the 2001 World Women's Handball Championship. ==Preliminary round== All times are local (UTC+1). ===Group A=== \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- ==Knockout stage== ===Bracket=== ===Semifinals=== \---- ===Seventh place game=== ===Fifth place game=== ===Third place game=== ===Final=== ==Final ranking== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2001 World Championship |} {| class="wikitable" !Rank !Team |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:gold medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:silver medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:bronze medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|4|| |- |align=center|5|| |- |align=center|6|| |- |align=center|7|| |- |align=center|8|| |} ==External links== *Results on todor66.com 2000 Women African Women's Handball Championship African Women's Handball Championship Category:2000 in Algerian sport Category:2000 in African handball Category:April 2000 sports events in Africa Category:May 2000 sports events in Africa Category:Women's handball in Algeria
